The First Toss

Published August 2013

The RPGist is a blog about RPGs. Dungeons & Dragons will feature most prominently, but articles about other games will make an appearance.

Some of the games that I would like to write about are:

  • D&D
  • Numenera
  • FATE
  • Blades in the Dark

Other article subjects will be events surrounding RPGs. Since I recently returned from GenCon 2013, the first series of posts will be about that event and experience. Look for those coming very soon!

About

rpgist (n): 1) one that specializes in the art or science or skill of RPGs, or 2) a blog about RPGs by @icosahedron
